descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.description: The resource to perform operations on
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new Onfleet worker

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an Onfleet worker

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a specific Onfleet worker

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many Onfleet workers

options.name: Get Schedule
options.description: Get a specific Onfleet worker schedule
options.action: Get the schedule for a worker

options.name: Update
options.description: Update an Onfleet worker

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the worker object for lookup
id.ai_hint: The ID of the worker object for lookup

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: capacity
options.description: The maximum number of units this worker can carry, for route optimization purposes

options.name: displayName
options.description: This value is used in place of the worker's actual name within sms notifications, delivery tracking pages, and across organization boundaries

values.name: type
values.description: Whether the worker has vehicle or not. If it's not provided, this worker will be treated as if on foot.

values.name: description
values.description: The vehicle's make, model, year, or any other relevant identifying details

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: capacity
options.description: The maximum number of units this worker can carry, for route optimization purposes

options.name: displayName
options.description: This value is used in place of the worker's actual name within sms notifications, delivery tracking pages, and across organization boundaries

options.name: name
options.description: The worker's name

options.name: teams
options.description: One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

containerType.name: containerType
containerType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

containerId.name: containerId
containerId.description: The object ID according to the container chosen
containerId.ai_hint: The object ID according to the container chosen

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

index.name: index
index.description: The index given indicates the position where the tasks are going to be inserted
index.ai_hint: The index given indicates the position where the tasks are going to be inserted

tasks.name: tasks
tasks.description: Task's ID that are going to be used
tasks.ai_hint: Task's ID that are going to be used

options.name: options
analytics
options.description: Whether a more detailed response is needed, includes basic worker duty event, traveled distance (meters) and time analytics

options.name: filter
options.description: A list of fields to show in the response, if all are not desired

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

unparsed.name: unparsed
unparsed.description: Whether or not the address is specified in a single unparsed string

addressNumber.name: addressNumber
addressNumber.description: The number component of this address, it may also contain letters
addressNumber.ai_hint: The number component of this address, it may also contain letters

destination.name: destination

values.name: unparsed
values.description: Whether or not the address is specified in a single unparsed string

values.name: addressNumber
values.description: The number component of this address, it may also contain letters

values.name: addressName
values.description: A name associated with this address

values.name: addressApartment
values.description: The suite or apartment number, or any additional relevant information

destination.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

getBy.name: getBy
getBy.description: The variable that is used for looking up a recipient
getBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

phone.name: phone
phone.description: A list of worker’s phone numbers
phone.ai_hint: A list of worker’s phone numbers

recipientPhone.name: recipientPhone
recipientPhone.description: A unique, valid phone number as per the organization's country if there's no leading + sign. If a phone number has a leading + sign, it will disregard the organization's country setting.
recipientPhone.ai_hint: A unique, valid phone number as per the organization's country if there's no leading + sign. If a phone number has a leading + sign, it will disregard the organization's country setting.

success.name: success
success.description: Whether the task's completion was successful

filters.name: filters

options.name: states
options.description: List of worker states

options.name: teams
options.description: A list of the teams that workers must be part of. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: phones
options.description: A list of workers' phone numbers

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

overrideFields.name: overrideFields

options.name: completeAfter
options.description: The earliest time the task should be completed

options.name: completeBefore
options.description: The latest time the task should be completed

options.name: notes
options.description: Notes for the task

options.name: pickupTask
options.description: Whether the task is a pickup task

options.name: serviceTime
options.description: The number of minutes to be spent by the worker on arrival at this task's destination, for route optimization purposes

overrideFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

workers.name: workers
workers.description: A list of workers. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
workers.ai_hint: A list of workers. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

managers.name: managers
managers.description: A list of managing administrators. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
managers.ai_hint: A list of managing administrators. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

byLocation.name: byLocation
byLocation.description: Whether to search for only those workers who are currently within a certain target area

teams.name: teams
teams.description: One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
teams.ai_hint: One or more teams of which the worker is a member. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

longitude.name: longitude
longitude.description: The longitude component of the coordinate pair
longitude.ai_hint: The longitude component of the coordinate pair

latitude.name: latitude
latitude.description: The latitude component of the coordinate pair
latitude.ai_hint: The latitude component of the coordinate pair

schedule.name: schedule

values.name: timezone
values.description: A valid timezone. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

schedule.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'admin' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'admin' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation IN ["create", "getAll"] THEN HIDE parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'admin' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'container' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation IN ["get", "addTask"] THEN SHOW parameter 'containerType'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation IN ["get", "addTask", "updateTask"] THEN SHOW parameter 'containerId'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation == 'addTask' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation == 'addTask' AND type == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'index'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation IN ["addTask", "updateTask"] THEN SHOW parameter 'tasks'
IF resource == 'container' AND operation IN ["addTask", "updateTask"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'destination' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'destination' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'create' THEN HIDE parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'unparsed'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == True THEN SHOW parameter 'address'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressNumber'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressStreet'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressCity'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressCountry'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'destination' AND operation == 'create' AND unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'hub' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'destination'
IF unparsed == True THEN SHOW parameter 'address'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressNumber'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressStreet'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressCity'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressState'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressCountry'
IF unparsed == False THEN SHOW parameter 'addressPostalCode'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'hub' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'organization' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'organization' AND operation == 'getDelegatee' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'recipient' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'getBy'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'get' AND getBy == 'id' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'get' AND getBy == 'name' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'get' AND getBy == 'phone' THEN SHOW parameter 'phone'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'recipientName'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'recipientPhone'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'recipient' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'destination'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'complete' THEN SHOW parameter 'success'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'clone' THEN SHOW parameter 'overrideFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'complete' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'team' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation IN ["get", "update", "delete", "getTimeEstimates", "autoDispatch"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'workers'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'managers'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'autoDispatch' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF routeEnd == 'hub' THEN SHOW parameter 'hub'
IF resource == 'team' AND operation == 'getTimeEstimates' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'worker' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'byLocation'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation IN ["get", "getSchedule", "setSchedule", "update", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'phone'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'teams'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' AND byLocation == True THEN SHOW parameter 'longitude'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' AND byLocation == True THEN SHOW parameter 'latitude'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' AND byLocation == True THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' AND byLocation == False THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'worker' AND operation == 'setSchedule' THEN SHOW parameter 'schedule'
